name: Yoshi Mobility
headline: Making car ownership and management frictionless.
description:
We believe that the automotive industry will change more in the next five years than it has in the last 50. The gas station was invented in 1910 and has not changed substantially since then; traditional lube and mechanic shops have not evolved much either.

To enable this industry transformation, the infrastructure required to fuel and service vehicles must evolve as well. Since the total spend for all fuel and maintenance can more than double the cost of ownership of a vehicle over its lifetime, the impact at stake is huge.

This is where we derived our mission: To help our members to keep moving in the safest, most efficient, and planet-friendly way possible, while delivering unparalleled customer service.

Start Yoshi. Keep Moving.

## We keepyour fleetmoving
Delivering mission-critical mobility solutions when and where they are needed
[Find Out More ](https://www.yoshimobility.com/<#intro>)
![icon](https://www.yoshimobility.com/assets/images/home/home-section-intro-icon.svg)
## Mobility Enabled
Find out how we are harnessing our software and hardware expertise, honed through delivering over a million services. Our partners include:
![](https://www.yoshimobility.com/assets/images/home/home-section-intro-logos.svg)
## EV _fast-charging_ anywhere
  * Off-Grid
  * Zero Setup
  * Charge Anywhere


Yoshi is helping power the transition to an electric future with flexible fast-charging solutions for delivery fleets, autonomous vehicles, corporate campuses and more. Our off-grid mobile charging units deploy quickly, saving up-front costs and time.
[Find Out More ](https://www.yoshimobility.com/</ev/>)
![](https://www.yoshimobility.com/assets/images/home/home-section-groups-ev.png)
## _Virtual_ Vehicle Inspections
  * Virtual Video Chat
  * Certified Inspectors


Yoshi provides virtual regulatory vehicle inspections for fleets, rideshare earners and commercial vehicle drivers. Experience the fastest and most convenient way to get your vehicle inspected so you can stay on the road and keep moving.
[Rideshare Earners ](https://www.yoshimobility.com/</inspections/>)[Commercial Vehicles ](https://www.yoshimobility.com/</inspections/dot/>)
![](https://www.yoshimobility.com/assets/images/home/home-section-groups-inspections.png)
## _Mobile_ Vehicle Maintenance
  * On-site
  * Flexible Scheduling
  * Reporting Tools


Yoshi provides an array of mobile preventive maintenance services to keep your fleet ready and rolling. Reduce labor costs and take advantage of our flexible scheduling and data reporting system to ensure your vehicles are all set for the road.
[Find Out More ](https://www.yoshimobility.com/</fleet/>)
![Yoshi vehicle inspections for ridehare drivers](https://www.yoshimobility.com/assets/images/home/home-section-groups-maintenance.png)
![icon](https://www.yoshimobility.com/assets/images/home/home-section-outro-icon.svg)

generated_description:
**Yoshi Mobility: Revolutionizing Transportation Management**

Founded in 2015 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S16, Yoshi Mobility is based in Nashville, TN, and has grown to a team of about 125 dedicated employees. With a bold mission—*Making car ownership and management frictionless*—Yoshi aims to reshape the automotive landscape, capitalizing on the immense changes expected in the industry over the next few years.

Yoshi identifies a significant pain point: the traditional automotive ecosystem has lagged in innovation since the gas station's inception. To address this, they are focusing on evolving vehicle fueling and servicing infrastructure, recognizing that fuel and maintenance costs can inflate the total cost of vehicle ownership dramatically.

The company's ethos is simple and powerful: **"To help our members keep moving in the safest, most efficient, and planet-friendly way possible, while delivering unparalleled customer service."**

### Services Offered

Yoshi Mobility is pushing the envelope ahead with several cutting-edge solutions:

1. **EV Fast-Charging**: Mobile and on-site electric vehicle charging units that are emissions-free and require zero setup.

2. **Rideshare Inspections**: Virtual and mobile inspection services that offer online scheduling with state-certified inspectors, ensuring fast results.

3. **DOT Inspections**: Quick and convenient inspections through virtual video chat, providing certified and speedy assessments.

4. **Mobile Services**: On-site maintenance that adapts to flexible scheduling needs while offering data reporting for better vehicle management.

Yoshi is not just about service; it's about delivering critical mobility solutions where and when they are needed most. They've powered over a million services, showcasing their expertise in integrating software and hardware for seamless operations. 

### Industry Position

Yoshi is well-positioned in a vital segment tagged as *autonomous delivery, mobility, energy, electric vehicles,* and *automotive*, focusing on the transition towards an electric future. 

Their Group Partner, Michael Seibel, adds significant industry insight and mentorship, further bolstering Yoshi's capabilities in navigating this rapidly changing sector.

### Conclusion

If you're looking for an innovative approach to vehicle management and services, Yoshi Mobility is your go-to partner. They embody the changemakers in an industry ripe for disruption, with a commitment to keeping you—or your fleet—moving forward efficiently and sustainably.

For more information, check out their website [Yoshi Mobility](https://www.yoshimobility.com) and explore how they plan to transform your mobility experience.
